column4: any one see any probs  with this set up ?   3gig dual core extreame, dual monitors, radeon 512mb card, gigabyte mborad, 2 gig mem
if you're hoping to run linux on that, get a nvidia
ati's linux drivers are horrible, nvidia's are half-decent
ahh  cool,  thnanks     now i know b4 i buy
also, in current-generation, nvidia cards are faster than the comparable ati cards anyway
i didnt know  that.      any nvidia   dual head cards  u think is best ?
what budget do you have? and what are you hoping to do with it?
the best cards price/performance wise on the market right now in my opinion are the 8800gt by nvidia, but a different brand than the standard Nvidia ones
I thought you were a Sabbath karaoke singer
why u say buget over kill ?
because linux, in all fairness, won't be using your videocard fully anyway.. and office doesn't require that much gpu processing power
which gt ?   the gtx  or gts
i suppose the gts  will run the compfision  thing
